description: Utility functions for mapping lesson titles and IDs to video assets, including slug generation, URL probing, and attaching video info to lesson objects in a React project.

methods.name: toVideoSlug
methods.description: Creates a URL-friendly slug from a string, normalizing and cleaning input.

methods.name: mapLessonToVideo
methods.description: Resolves a lesson object to video URL, poster, and captions based on title and ID.

methods.name: attachVideoToLesson
methods.description: Enhances a lesson object with video and thumbnail URLs if missing.
